definitions.text: a city in southeastern France on the Mediterranean; the leading resort on the French Riviera
pleasant or pleasing or agreeable in nature or appearance; - George Meredith
examples: what a nice fellow you are and we all thought you so nasty
had a nice time at the party
the corn and tomatoes are nice today

definitions.text: socially or conventionally correct; refined or virtuous

examples: a job requiring nice measurements with a micrometer
too nice about his food to take to camp cooking
so squeamish he would only touch the toilet handle with his elbow
